title: Some Nice T206 Portraits for Sale / Trade - Tinker, Dahlen, Lajoie, and more
author: T206.org

posts.post_title: Some Nice T206 Portraits for Sale / Trade - Tinker, Dahlen, Lajoie, and more
posts.post_content:
Please see the cards marked for sale or trade here:
[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/traeregan/all-cards[/url]

PayPal please add 3%.

For trades, I'm only looking for really nice T206 portraits - centering, registration, color, and overall eye-appeal are key.

Email preferred, PM okay though.
[url]trae@t206.org[/url]

Full scan of the Lajoie... happy to provide any other on-request.

(very small bit of paper loss by the P in Piedmont is what brings this one down)
[IMG]http://www.t206.org/misc/lajoie.jpg[/IMG]

Bumpa-bumpa!

Lajoie (above), Howell, and Tinker portraits still available.

[IMG]http://www.t206.org/misc/tinker.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.t206.org/misc/howell_copy.jpg[/IMG]

Added Dougherty to For Sale / For Trade list - $99

[IMG]http://www.t206.org/misc/dougherty_copy.jpg[/IMG]
